participant_1.background:
I am not happy in my job or marriage.
teaching is my passion.
I am afraid of failing to reach my full potential.
My family is poor, but we work hard to make a living.
i got a job as a coach at a local highschool.

participant_2.background:
My most difficult decision was whether to follow my dreams or to stay in a stable job.
I don't have a car, but I often bike to the basketball court.
this past summer i hiked the appalachian trail.
I'm doing well in school, thanks for asking!
I lost everything when the economy crashed.

content.text: Hey there! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you doing today?
I'm doing good! I'm a bit nervous about my new job, but I'm excited to start.
That's great to hear! What's your new job?
I'm going to be a coach at a local high school.
That sounds like a great job! I bet you'll be great at it.
Thank you! I'm hoping so. I'm really passionate about teaching, so I'm excited to get started.
That's awesome! I'm sure your students will love you.
Thanks! I hope so too.
What's your biggest fear?
I'm afraid of failing to reach my full potential.
That's a common fear. But I'm sure you'll do great things.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
No problem! So, what's your favorite thing to do?
I love to spend time with my family. They're really important to me.
That's great! I love spending time with my family too.
What's your favorite thing to do with them?
We love to go hiking and biking.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been hiking before.
You should try it! It's really great exercise and it's a lot of fun.
I might have to try it sometime.
You definitely should! It's great to get outside and explore
